channel.title: {508}GA the revolutionary server{508}
channel.description:
ok so i have decided this. version 3 will be released today so im going to start a new 508
reasons version 3 is being released early: I started to become lazy by adding stuff that i did not look at and forgot about source became UNSTABLE
my next source will be released in sections. the first one will have 100% shops clan wars/clan chat and summoning. with a better combat.
v2 updated v1 with more stuff
and so on
you should expect in the first few versions:
Assault minigame a better castlewars a better bounty hunter Clan wars jad minigame (right place) Fight pits clan chat Summoning (because it is a combat skill) Dueling Mage bank
as you can see these are all combat related.
i will have about 5 releases before to make non-combat stuff gets released.
my main goals for this:
to learn more java make a stable/reliable server make a good base for newcomers but not fully done so you have to actually work on it
unlike my last releases this server will have a home (lunar isle) and will have quests etc to earn things.
it will be a non-command based server and all teleports will be by item operated or magic tab.
there will not be a "training area" because it will be spread out. such as i will have revenents and dragons in the wilderness, men in lumbridge, guards in falador and varrok.
also to look for is a possibility of a working grand exchange, trade, and shops (not dragonkings)
~~GA the revolution of 508's~~
pictures will be coming soon, but since i have not started yet i cant add any :(
if you would like to join my community click the link in my sig.
ON PHATT AND MY FORUMS I WILL BE MAKING SERVER RELEASES DAILY EX:
v0.1 v0.2 v0.3

item.description:
@Gods_army wrote:

ok so i have decided this. version 3 will be released today so im going to start a new 508

reasons version 3 is being released early:
I started to become lazy by adding stuff that i did not look at and forgot about
source became UNSTABLE

my next source will be released in sections. the first one will have 100% shops clan wars/clan chat and summoning. with a better combat.

v2 updated v1 with more stuff

and so on

you should expect in the first few versions:

Assault minigame
a better castlewars
a better bounty hunter
Clan wars
jad minigame (right place)
Fight pits
clan chat
Summoning (because it is a combat skill)
Dueling
Mage bank

as you can see these are all combat related.

i will have about 5 releases before to make non-combat stuff gets released.

my main goals for this:

to learn more java
make a stable/reliable server
make a good base for newcomers but not fully done so you have to actually work on it

unlike my last releases this server will have a home (lunar isle) and will have quests etc to earn things.

it will be a non-command based server and all teleports will be by item operated or magic tab.

there will not be a “training area” because it will be spread out. such as i will have revenents and dragons in the wilderness, men in lumbridge, guards in falador and varrok.

also to look for is a possibility of a working grand exchange, trade, and shops (not dragonkings)

GA the revolution of 508’s

pictures will be coming soon, but since i have not started yet i cant add any

if you would like to join my community click the link in my sig.
